com.hp.jipp.trans

Interface IppClientTransport


  • public IppClientTransport

    Transport used to send packets and collect responses from a IPP server

    • Constructor Detail

      • IppClientTransport

        public IppClientTransport()

    • Method Detail

      • sendData

        @NotNull
IppPacketData sendData(@NotNull
                                java.net.URI uri,
                                @NotNull
                                IppPacketData request)

        Deliver an IPP packet to the specified URL along with any additional data, and return the response packet (or throw an error).

        Note: implementations should check Thread.interrupted periodically and fail gracefully.

        See Also:
        Thread.interrupted
